Uses of Schema in com.dyuproject.protostuff
 

Classes in com.dyuproject.protostuff that implement Schema
 class CustomSchema<T>
          A schema (helper class) that wraps another schema and allows its subclasses to override certain methods for more customization.

Uses of Schema in com.dyuproject.protostuff.runtime
 

Classes in com.dyuproject.protostuff.runtime that implement Schema
 class MappedSchema<T>
          Base class for schemas that maps fields by number and name.
 class RuntimeSchema<T>
          A schema that can be generated and cached at runtime for objects that have no schema.
 

Methods in com.dyuproject.protostuff.runtime that return Schema
static
<T> Schema<T>
RuntimeSchema.getSchema(Class<T> typeClass)
          Gets the schema that was either registered or lazily initialized at runtime.
 

Methods in com.dyuproject.protostuff.runtime with parameters of type Schema
static
<T> void
RuntimeSchema.register(Class<T> typeClass, Schema<T> schema)
          Registers the schema which overrides any existing schema mapped with the given class.
